post_detail.title: I Work at Click
post_detail.description:
My Contribution:

A veteran of the agency world, I have worked at JWT, Big Spaceship, DG MediaMind, and 291 Digital. I joined the Click family as a Lead Technologist to help strategically position the company at the forefront of the tech industry. I enjoy finding innovative solutions to the diverse challenges of our clients. I thrive on uncovering how things function and how to make them better. Fast, smart and creative with strong artistic sensibilities, I enjoy architecting digital campaign executions that require a multitude of interconnected technologies. I am equally comfortable diving deep into code or brainstorming creative ideas for a concept.

The Company:

In a constantly evolving landscape, ClickFire Media (CFM) is always one step ahead. Click has all the tech tools along with amazing creative and technology talent under one roof.
